==Translingual==

===Etymology===
A combination of semantic [[氵]] ("[[water]]", ''used for rivers'') + phonetic [[折]] ([[Appendix:Baxter-Sagart Old Chinese reconstruction|Old Chinese]]: *''tet''), although usually glossed as semantic as well ("[[broken]], [[crooked]], [[bent]]").

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=85|rad=水|as=07|sn=10|four=32121|canj=EQHL}}

# {{lb|zh|geography|abbreviation}} ''Short for'' '''[[浙江]]''': [[Zhejiang]], the [[coastal]] [[province]] of [[eastern]] [[China]] [[lying]] [[between]] [[Hangzhou]] [[bay|Bay]] and [[Fujian]].
# {{lb|zh|historical|geography}} A [[former]] [[name]] of the [[Qiantang]] [[river|River]] in [[Zhejiang]].
